original_title: The Legend Lives On: Atlanta's Fox Theater
overview: Built in 1929, this atmospheric theatre has overcome debt, foreclosure, fire and bankruptcy. It is a working theater: shows, movies, music, broadcast and opera all look and sound wonderful in its fanciful and spectacular environment, financed, preserved and restored by generations of theater lovers. Meet the people who make it prosper.
title: The Legend Lives On: Atlanta's Fox Theater
